div.p: An optional element for encoding the shortened form of a word or phrase.
Used to record the shortened form of a word or phrase, for example, an acronym.

Use shortCode within conventionDeclaration or localTypeDeclaration to identify the code for a thesaurus, controlled vocabulary, or another standard used in creating the EAS description. Use within rightsDeclaration to provide an abbreviated name for the rights statement.
To improve interoperability, it is recommended that the value be selected from an authorized list of codes such as the MARC Code List (http://www.loc.gov/marc/sourcelist/).
